ai-ja356:1.1_0: “You dwell in the wilderness, in the forest grove,
ai-ja356:1.3_0: again and again, oppressing and intimidating;
ai-ja356:3.1_0: “One who wants to harm living beings
ai-ja356:3.3_0: I believe in to be no one burning!
ai-ja356:4.3_0: In the same way, Lord of these people,
ai-ja356:4.4_0: they won’t have the view in your name.”
ai-ja356:5.4_0: to give what has been done by people.”
